<h3 id="X34640">X(34640) = CENTER OF THE HR-ELLIPSE OF THESE TRIANGLES: ANTI-MANDART-INCIRCLE TO ANTI-AQUILA</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a^4-3*(b+c)*a^3-2*(b^2-5*b*c+c^2)*a^2+(b+c)*(3*b^2-8*b*c+3*c^2)*a+(b^2-c^2)^2  :  :

<br>
<b>X(34640) = X(1)+2*X(13463) = 3*X(1)-X(34701) = X(4)+2*X(33895) = 3*X(551)-X(34639) = 2*X(946)+X(10912) = 4*X(946)-X(32049) = X(962)+2*X(11260) = 2*X(1537)+X(11256) = 5*X(3091)-2*X(32537) = 7*X(3624)-4*X(32157) = 2*X(4301)+X(12513) = 3*X(4421)-2*X(34639) = 2*X(10912)+X(32049) = X(12699)+2*X(22837) = 6*X(13463)+X(34701)</b>
<p>
The center of the reciprocal HR-ellipse of these triangles is X(34639)</p>
<p>X(34640) lies on these lines:
{1,528}, {2,3057}, {4,33895}, {8,5087}, {65,11240}, {78,34720}, {355,381}, {388,3241}, {515,34706}, {516,34620}, {527,4301}, {529,31162}, {535,12699}, {551,3295}, {903,7185}, {962,11260}, {1001,4342}, {1145,23708}, {1320,5252}, {1329,3679}, {1387,17564}, {1537,11256}, {1836,34605}, {1837,10707}, {2098,5794}, {2550,4345}, {2802,5886}, {2886,7962}, {3061,17281}, {3091,32537}, {3340,31146}, {3434,5048}, {3545,7704}, {3624,32157}, {3655,34708}, {3680,11522}, {3813,6831}, {3828,31493}, {3872,24703}, {3880,5603}, {3885,11375}, {3895,15950}, {3913,6918}, {3922,10586}, {4479,20449}, {4853,31142}, {4861,11114}, {4870,11239}, {5434,7702}, {5450,11194}, {5587,5854}, {5697,26066}, {5722,21630}, {5734,6835}, {5855,11224}, {6256,28204}, {6690,9819}, {6917,24680}, {6971,24387}, {7705,26129}, {7951,12653}, {8148,10916}, {9957,28628}, {10107,14986}, {10199,11373}, {10246,34707}, {10914,25681}, {10915,18493}, {11111,30305}, {11508,16371}, {12436,19706}, {12625,16189}, {12648,17605}, {17556,30384}, {19860,34687}, {19875,25522}, {30960,31136}, {31164,34749}</p>
<p>
X(34640) = midpoint of X(i) and X(j) for these {i,j}: {962, 34610}, {10912, 11236}, {11224, 24392}, {34700, 34710}<br>
X(34640) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (3679, 3829), (4421, 551), (11236, 946), (32049, 11236), (34610, 11260), (34647, 3656)<br>
X(34640) = complement of X(34711)<br>
X(34640) = pole of the line {145, 18839} wrt Feuerbach hyperbola<br>
X(34640) = {X(i),X(j)}-harmonic conjugate of X(k) for these (i,j,k): (946, 10912, 32049), (3680, 11522, 12607), (11235, 34710, 34700)<br>
</p>
